DRAPER
(TO PIERRE) You are the very man that
took it—my cloth, I mean. (TO JUDGE)
Oh, you can’t imagine, sir, by what
deceit-
JUDGE
Hold your tongue! Are you an idiot?
Leave that matter alone, and let’s come
to the point of this one.
DRAPER
True, Your Worship. I’ll not utter
another word about it. Jjinother time^^
it will be different.^ (PAUSE) Well,
as I was saying I gave six yards —
